We help to grow your business We adopt the agile scrum and hybrid methodologies, while engaging various cutting–edge tools for collaborations

WHAT WE DO

About Us

We are a customer centric I.T services provider deploying solutions to individuals and governments while maintaining a simplistic approach to the experience of products and services

We specialize in deploying our unique technology to help governments and corporations manage identities, grow internally generated revenue, enhance transaction integrity, streamline HR functions and block financial loopholes.

Learn More

OUR TOP SERVICES

Software Development Services

Procurement

Auditing

Reporting and Analytics

Payroll

Biometric Technology

e-Billing

Our Products

SmartPay

SmartPay is a unique Human Resource and Payroll management solution, developed with the latest update in software technology.

Learn More

SmartRev

SmartRev Solution is an intelligent cloud based solution designed to manage the collection of taxes, levies and other internal generated revenue in a comprehensive manner.

Learn More

SmartAudit

SmartAudit verifies that businesses and government are paying employees accurately, timely, and in compliance with the law.

Learn More

CEO's Statement

At Smartapps IT Ltd. Our mission is to develop and deploy premium, value-creating solutions while offering unparalleled services to facilitate safe and reliable financial transactions, data management and enhanced end-user experience. We are committed to delivering cutting-edge technologies that not only meet the needs of today but also anticipate the challenges of tomorrow.

Our dedication to excellence, integrity, and collaboration drives us to continuously strive for greatness and make a positive impact on the world.

Guiding Philosophy

“More than anything else,
what we are obsessed about is results.”

Our Value Discipline

Product Leadership

This is our primary value discipline. SmartApps succeeds primarily by innovating products to meet market needs faster and better than its competitors. Our emphasis is not on product price but on product performance. 

Team Work

Great companies and products are built by great teams. SmartApps narrows down on the individual team member helping such teammate with navigating through projects as well as identifying strengths as well as weakness in the quest to build the best team in the world

Customer Intimacy

SmartApps provides high level of personalized service to customers as we believe that listening to our customers and having real connections with them forms the core of our success 

Operational Excellence

SmartApps thrives on  offering products and services more efficiently than its competitors can offer them.

Coaching

The company places emphasis more on coaching as a policy. This is aimed at transferring skills and knowledge to increase productivity and growth.

I.T. Consultancy Services

We offer the following consultancy services:

IGR

Payroll

e-Government

Our Partners
